hero.title: Full Stack Developer

hero.description: Specialized in creating scalable, user-friendly solutions that drive business growth. With expertise in React, TypeScript, and cloud technologies, I transform ideas into reality.

about.title: About Me
about.heading: Passionate About Building Digital Experiences
about.paragraph1: With over 5 years of experience in web development, I specialize in creating modern, responsive applications that solve real-world problems.
about.paragraph2: My journey in tech started with a curiosity about how things work on the web, and it has evolved into a career where I get to build amazing products every day.
about.paragraph3: I'm constantly learning new technologies and best practices to stay at the forefront of web development, ensuring every project I work on uses the best tools available.
about.cleanCodeDesc: Writing maintainable, scalable code following best practices and industry standards.
about.fastDeliveryDesc: Efficient development process ensuring timely delivery without compromising quality.
about.collaborationDesc: Strong communication skills and experience working in agile, cross-functional teams.
